column4: i agree about downgrading...you would be better making a user profile backup and reinstalling...much cleaner and faster, otherwise you will be among those that call linux buggy and slow
from now on...try the new versions of Ubuntu or *nix version in VMWare prior to updating your computer...it has saved me many of Tylenol(R)
haha, thanks im already at the buggy opinion right now
nice...I said that when I just installed Microsoft Vista Ultimate RC1 over my XP Pro and wiped out all my life's bookmarks in IE and Firefox....I know the feeling
